ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item

Interface IRestrictedGraphItem

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEdge, IGraphItem, IRestrictedEdge, IRestrictedVertex, IVertex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGraphItem, AbstractRestrictedGraphItem, GravisEdge, GravisVertex, RestrictedEdge, RestrictedVertex

    public interface IRestrictedGraphItem
    "current" variables ar permanent, "new" variables are temporary
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)
